pr_title: doc(iot-dev): Add missing javadoc explaining SetSendInterval for setOption API

timeline.message: doc(iot-dev): Add missing javadoc explaining SetSendInterval for setOption API

timeline.author: vinagesh
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -548,6 +548,10 @@ public void subscribeToDeviceMethod(DeviceMethodCallback deviceMethodCallback, O * the service checking for availability of new messages. The value * is expected to be of type {@code long}. * + * - SetSendInterval - this option is applicable to all protocols. + * This value sets the period (in milliseconds) that this SDK spawns a thread to send a queued message.

replies.bodyText: Period implies that it spawns periodically, so I like it here
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

replies.bodyText: I see. I did not infer that initially but makes sense now.
replies.author: vinagesh

revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/DeviceClient.java b/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/DeviceClient.java index 9404e5dd4..85622b3ea 100644 --- a/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/DeviceClient.java +++ b/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/DeviceClient.java @@ -549,7 +549,7 @@ public final class DeviceClient extends InternalClient implements Closeable * is expected to be of type {@code long}. * * - SetSendInterval - this option is applicable to all protocols. - * This value sets the period (in milliseconds) that this SDK spawns a thread to send a queued message. + * This value sets the period (in milliseconds) that this SDK spawns threads to send queued messages. * Even if no message is queued, this thread will be spawned. * * - SetReceiveInterval - this option is applicable to all protocols

timeline.author: vinagesh
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -360,6 +360,10 @@ public DeviceClientConfig getConfig() * the service checking for availability of new messages. The value * is expected to be of type {@code long}. * + * - SetSendInterval - this option is applicable to all protocols. + * This value sets the period (in milliseconds) that this SDK spawns a thread to send a queued message.

revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/InternalClient.java b/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/InternalClient.java index e8e74ba40..f67964426 100644 --- a/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/InternalClient.java +++ b/device/iot-device-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/device/InternalClient.java @@ -361,7 +361,7 @@ public class InternalClient * is expected to be of type {@code long}. * * - SetSendInterval - this option is applicable to all protocols. - * This value sets the period (in milliseconds) that this SDK spawns a thread to send a queued message. + * This value sets the period (in milliseconds) that this SDK spawns threads to send queued messages. * Even if no message is queued, this thread will be spawned. * * - SetReceiveInterval - this option is applicable to all protocols
